column1: # FASE 3 LEI III: Configuração para SPA React

column3: Vulnerable JS Library (CDN - Known False Positive)
Incomplete or No Cache-control Header (SPA Static Assets)
Content Security Policy Missing (We have it in _headers)
Dangerous JS Functions (eval for bundler - safe)
Cross Site Scripting (Persistent) - In URL (False positive in SPA routing)
